cause.description:
Its just a fun cause, to attract people addicted or finding fun out of Racing with their illegal Tuned street cars. Mostly a Cause that evolves around our friends being silly...
But any Drag/Dice/Burnout photo's shall be appreciated.
1. No Jazzed-up Car on the street is unnoticed by Wareagle.
2. WEED - Wareagle Extreme Elimination Drag.
cause.mission: Find Illegal street racing amongst Friends/Followers
cause.name: Wareagle Dice Finders
